name: Runlancer
description:
«Unknown location, unknown character, known goal - to move forward»
Pass all the tests that the Complex has prepared for you and find out the meaning of what is happening. You will not be able to influence what is happening, do not try to die, the Complex will not allow. Can you run to the end and leave this dark place?

New features

Use the elements of the environment, as well as the equipment provided to you, to overcome insurmountable obstacles.

Improvise

Passage of tests is variable, use different combinations in combination with your capabilities, for faster passage.

Be attentive

The complex left short but dangerous paths for passing the tests, can you find them all?

Compete with your friends

Complete the level and compare your result with your friends, as well as with players around the world. Improve your results by running races with your ghost and become the best.
